agentData.mission: QA found borderline confidence - research agent should verify claims

findings.content: Finding 1: No primary-source verification was completed because the agent requested the exact claim text plus attribution (speaker/organization) and publication details (date/location/link).

Finding 2: No independent fact-check corroboration was completed; the agent specified that it needs the precise claim and context to query outlets like AP/Reuters/PolitiFact/FactCheck.org/Snopes/Full Fact and summarize corroboration and caveats.

Finding 3: No peer-reviewed or dataset-based synthesis was produced; the agent indicated it requires the specific claim plus scoping parameters (domain, population/context, time window, and preferred study designs) to return evidence strength and effect sizes.

Finding 4: The only concrete output is an actionable information request (an intake template) that, if answered, would enable completion of the verification tasks in 2â€“3 paragraph cited summaries per query.
